item.title: Ethereum Futures Open Interest Hits All-Time High of Around $35.5 Billion
item.description: On August 13th, based on Glassnode data, with the spot price surging above $4700, the open interest of Ethereum futures reached a new all-time high of approximately $35.5 billion. The leverage levels on various trading platforms have rebounded, laying the groundwork for greater volatility after position concentration.Sharp Increase in Short Squeeze: On August 12th, when the price was close to $4,620, around $66 million worth of short positions were liquidated, which marked the second-largest short liquidation event this year.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: Series of Rate Cuts Could Start with 50 Basis Point Cut in September
item.description: August 13th: Treasury Secretary Benson of the US mentioned the potential for a 50-basis-point rate cut by the Fed. If the data is reliable, the Fed may cut rates earlier.It is considered that a series of rate cuts may be implemented. This series of rate cuts may commence with a 50-basis-point cut in September. The Fed's rates should now be reduced by 150 to 175 basis points. (Oriental Fortune Network)

item.title: Publicly traded company 707 Cayman will explore establishing a cryptocurrency treasury reserve, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.
item.description: On August 13th, 707 Cayman Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: JEM), a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands, is primarily engaged in the sale of high-quality clothing products and offers comprehensive supply chain management solutions. The company announced today that it has reached a Memorandum of Understanding (referred to as "MOU" hereinafter) with Precious Choice Global Limited. Precious Choice is a limited liability company registered in the British Virgin Islands.According to the MOU, 707 Cayman will collaborate with Precious Choice to explore the establishment of a cryptocurrency reserve treasury, which includes but is not limited to Bitcoin, BNB (Binance Coin), Ethereum, etc., and plans to significantly increase its holdings within the next 12 months. The specific details are still under negotiation.The company's directors hold the view that virtual assets and the Web3 field have captured the attention of global investors and stakeholders. By signing the MOU, the company can ex

item.title: Whales Accumulate Over $1.1M in $BGB recently as Bitget Burns 43% of Total Supply
item.description: Whales are accumulating $BGB recently. 0x8900 withdrew 192,668 $BGB($936K) from #Bitget over the past 2 months. 0x171D withdrew 30,607 $BGB($134K) from #Bitget 2 days ago. 0x7C9C withdrew 20,980 $BGB($102K) from #Bitget over the past 3 months. Notably, #Bitget has burned a total of 860M $BGB($5.25B) over the past 8 months, reducing the total supply by 43%.

item.title: A certain Ethereum ICO address has deposited an additional 2,283 ETH to a CEX, totaling over 10 million USD in value.
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, the address of a certain Ethereum ICO participant deposited an additional 2,283 ETH into Kraken, which is valued at $10.42 million.This address had previously made a deposit of 2,000 ETH into Kraken on August 11th and had acquired 100,000 ETH during the ICO period.

item.title: Infinex will suspend Yaprun, but will still honor the first season
item.description: August 13th: The cross-chain aggregation DeFi platform Infinex announced that although both Infinex and Kaito had implemented anti-brush measures, Yaprun still couldn't avoid the problem it was originally supposed to solve: noise overwhelmed the signal. What was originally meticulously crafted "cognitive sharecropping" quickly deteriorated into industrialized junk content production - the timeline was filled with low-quality content. Robots destroyed the network effect that was originally brought by genuine content creators.The team has decided to pause Yaprun after the end of the first season in order to implement significant improvements and bot-nerfing measures. The second season will return once we have addressed the fundamental issue of "how to maintain quality at scale" and ensure that "attention optimization" does not revert to the "noise farm" that we were trying to eliminate.The reward pool of the first season is approximately 1.5 billion Î¼Patrons, and users who have been

item.title: Shitcoin Season Index Rebounds to 41
item.description: On August 13th, according to Coinmarketcap data, the Altcoin Season Index has increased to 41. It had dropped to 29 on August 11th. This index indicates that within the past 90 days, approximately 41 projects among the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization have outperformed Bitcoin.Note: The CMC Cryptocurrency Altseason Index is a real-time indicator utilized to determine whether the current cryptocurrency market is in an altcoin-dominant season. This index is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins in relation to Bitcoin over the past 90 days.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: ETH Surges Past $4600, Approaching 5% from 21-Year All-Time High, Cautioning Against Significant Pullback Risk
item.description: August 13th. Ethereum (ETH) breached $4600, only about 5% away from the all-time high of $4868 in November 2021. This price breakthrough has drawn extensive market attention. Many investors think that ETH may have entered a stage of a temporary peak and need to be vigilant against a sharp pullback in the short term.BiyaPay analysts pointed out that as the price of ETH continues to rise, market sentiment is gradually changing to caution. Although ETH, as the leader in smart contract platforms, still has a promising long-term outlook, it may face a pullback risk in the short term. Therefore, investors should pay attention to market fluctuations and actively manage risks.In such a market environment, BiyaPay provides users with a variety of trading options. The platform supports the exchange of more than 200 cryptocurrencies such as BTC and ETH. There are zero transaction fees for spot and contract limit orders, which significantly reduces trading costs. Additionally, users can also t

item.title: ãBig Brother Whaleã Huang Licheng Shorts Ethereum, Opens 1100 ETH Position with 25x Leverage
item.description: On August 13th, as monitored by OnchainLens, "Brother Ma" Huang Licheng opened a short position in ETH with a leverage of 25 times, holding 1,100 ETH worth $5.16 million. The liquidation price is $40,256.Earlier on this day, "Brother Ma" Huang Licheng closed his long positions in ETH (with a 25x leverage) and HYPE (with a 5x leverage), achieving a total profit of $33.83 million.

item.title: Analysis: Tom Lee Could Make Billions in a Single Trade
item.description: On August 13th, FTX debt claim expert Thomas Braziel posted and stated, "Tom Lee is going to become a billionaire through this transaction - he holds a 10-year, 5% BMNR call option that I think is currently valued between $300 million and $350 million."Tom Lee joined BitMine as chairman on June 30th when the price of ETH was approximately $2500. As of today, ETH has risen to $4700, representing an 88% increase since June 30th.
